sentences.en: A water vole swam vigorously upstream.
sentences.cn: 一只水鼠奋力向上游游去.

sentences.en: Altruistic spirit should be cultivated by us vigorously.
sentences.cn: 利他的精神是我们应该努力培养的。

sentences.en: Doctrinal differences were vigorously debated among religious leaders.
sentences.cn: 宗教领袖之间就教义分歧问题问题争论激烈。

sentences.en: He launched into a rhythm vigorously.
sentences.cn: 他开始使劲演奏这首曲子.

sentences.en: He rubbed his limbs vigorously to get the blood circulating.
sentences.cn: 他用力摩擦四肢让血液循环开来.

sentences.en: He shook the amber bottle vigorously.
sentences.cn: 他用力摇晃这个琥珀色的瓶子。

sentences.en: He shook the blankets vigorously to get rid of the dust.
sentences.cn: 他使劲抖动毯子以抖掉尘土.

sentences.en: Plants that are growing vigorously are less likely to be vulnerable to disease.
sentences.cn: 生命力强的植物不容易得病。

sentences.en: Poland and Czechoslovakia have vigorously pursued admission to the European Community.
sentences.cn: 波兰和捷克斯洛伐克已经积极寻求加入欧共体。

sentences.en: She shivered and rubbed her arms vigorously.
sentences.cn: 她颤抖着，使劲地搓着自己的胳膊。

sentences.en: Some women work vigorously just like men.
sentences.cn: 有些妇女干起活来,如同男子汉.

sentences.en: The police vigorously denied that excessive force had been used.
sentences.cn: 警方坚决否认曾经滥用武力。

sentences.en: The vegetables in the garden vegetate vigorously.
sentences.cn: 园子里的植物在茁壮成长.

trans.tran_cn: 精神旺盛地，活泼地，大力，蓬蓬勃勃，猛力
